Contact Us – Seafood and Sounds Festival Seafood & Sounds is returning in 2025! Mark your calendar for this exciting event on September 13th & 14th Home What’s In Store Lineup Performers Exhibitors The Parade Information Merchandise Business Hub Our Sponsors Contact Us Contact Us Get In Touch If you would like to find out more about the festival and or any of the information contained within our website, please do get in touch using our contact form. If you would like to get involved, we would love to hear from you. Please fill out the form or contact us direct on email. For sponsorship, contact Jeanette – jea@thepinksugarmouse.com For volunteering, contact Nikki – info@customhousepoole.co.uk If you are interested in a stall during the event please email Helen helen@coastalcruisespoole.co.uk Email Us Your name Your email Subject Your message (optional) Seafood & Sounds Festival Where Poole’s heritage of seafood & music come together for an amazing weekend. Florida Seafood Festival - Apalachicola, St. George Island Florida Apalachicola Bay Chamber of Commerce Business and travel information for Apalachicola, St. George Island and Eastpoint Florida We’re Social! Follow Us. Home The Area Getting Here Apalachicola Eastpoint St. George Island Surrounding Areas Relocation Things to Do Beaches Boating & Fishing Golf Courses Museums, Parks & Theater Natural Attractions Night Life Shopping Tours & Adventures Weddings & Special Occasions Spas & Fitness Centers Places to Stay Dining Events Businesses Business Categories Membership Information Chamber Newsletter Ribbon Cuttings Spring Break & Easter Break Schedules 2025 Job Listings Classifieds How to Start a Business (PDF) COVID-19 About « All Events Florida Seafood Festival October 31 @ 8:00 am - November 1 @ 5:00 pm « Apalach Ghost Tour Free Tech Help Sessions Offered at the Carrabelle Library » 62nd Annual Florida Seafood Festival October 31 & November 1, 2025 The Florida Seafood Festival is a two day event annually drawing tens of thousands of visitors to the historic town of Apalachicola in scenic Franklin County. The Festival is held at the mouth of the Apalachicola river under the shady oaks of Apalachicola’s Battery Park. The festival features delicious seafood, arts and crafts exhibits, seafood related events, Musical Entertainment. Some of the notable events include Oyster Eating and Oyster Shucking contest, Blue Crab Races, Photo Contest, Parade, 5k Redfish Run, The Blessing of the Fleet, History of the Festival Exhibit Add to calendar Google Calendar iCalendar Outlook 365 Outlook Live Details Start: October 31 @ 8:00 am End: November 1 @ 5:00 pm Website: www.floridaseafoodfestival.com « Apalach Ghost Tour Free Tech Help Sessions Offered at the Carrabelle Library » Add your event to our calendar. Apalachicola Bay Chamber of Commerce & Visitor Center 17 Avenue E Apalachicola, Florida 32320 (850) 653-9419 Info@ApalachicolaBay.org Sitemap Website made in Apalachicola, Florida by 2K Web Group

Florida Blue Orange Bowl Food & Wine Celebration presented by Florida Blue tladmin 2025-04-18T11:20:15-04:00 Date: April 2026 Location: Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Hollywood Enjoy fine foods and flavors from over 40 of South Florida’s top restaurants! Orange Bowl’s signature fundraiser benefiting Orange Bowl Cares. Event features: All-you-can-eat food tastings from more than 40 of South Florida’s top restaurants and chefs Unlimited selection of wines, craft beers and signature cocktails Live entertainment – DJ, live band, and more! Raffle prizes and silent auctions featuring exciting prizes such as luxurious hotel stays, autographed sports memorabilia and more. Celebrity judges to determine the Showstopper Award (Best Presentation), Taste of South Florida (Best Flavor) and Chef’s Kiss (Most Creative) Attendees vote for the People’s Choice Award for Best Bite and Best Dessert, as well as Best Overall Restaurant Ticket sales are now closed. Please check back soon for details on our 2026 event. Supporting our community never tasted so good! 2025 Winners: Orange Bowl Food & Wine Celebration 2025 Champion: NYY Steak Showstopper Award – Best Presentation: S3: Sun Surf and Sand Taste of South Florida – Best Flavor: Bol Chef’s Kiss – Most Creative: Fireman Derek’s Bake Shop People’s Choice Award – Best Bite: Bae Korean Grill People’s Choice Award – Best Dessert: Ninashe’s World Famous Banana Pudding PRESENTING SPONSOR ASSOCIATE SPONSORS Subscribe To Our Newsletter Get all the latest information on events, sales and offers. Seafood Festival Pensacola | Pensacola | Pensacola Seafood Festival top of page HOME FOOD MUSIC ARTS & CRAFTS FOR KIDS FAQ MERCH More Use tab to navigate through the menu items. 2025 PENSACOLA SEAFOOD FESTIVAL SPONSORED BY THE PENSACOLA ICE FLYERS DOWNTOWN PENSACOLA Fri, Sept. 26 11AM-11PM Sat, Sept. 27 10AM-11PM Sun, Sept. 28 11AM-5PM Winner! Congrats to Marygrace House! "Seafood Social" 2025 Poster Artwork Introducing *ARTS VENDOR APPLICATIONS ARE CLOSED* ARTS, CRAFTS, GIFTS & MORE 2025 VENDOR APPLICATIONS - CLOSED ARTS & CRAFTS VENDOR APPLICATIONS ARE CLOSED IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN BEING ADDED TO THE WAITLIST, PLEASE EMAIL MDWEST@FIESTAPENSACOLA.ORG The arts & crafts category consists of 100% handmade items. Examples of these items include: handmade jewelry, pottery, paintings, photographs, drawings, soaps, woodcrafts, metal work, glass, handmade clothing, etc. ​ COMMERCIAL VENDOR APPLICATIONS ARE CLOSED IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN BEING ADDED TO THE WAITLIST, PLEASE EMAIL MDWEST@FIESTAPENSACOLA.ORG The commercial category consists of  items that are artistically enhanced, not 100% made by the vendor and/or retail items. Examples of these items include brand names, such as Scentsy, LulaRoe, Young Living, Lilla Rose, Pampered Chef, Cutco Cutlery, Paparazzi, etc. It also includes items such as retail clothing and jewelry, embellished accessories, antiques and anything considered "resale". ​ CORPORATE VENDOR APPLICATIONS ARE CLOSED IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN BEING ADDED TO THE WAITLIST, PLEASE EMAIL MDWEST@FIESTAPENSACOLA.ORG The corporate category consists of businesses who wish to attend on  a promotional basis. Examples of these businesses include: cell phone providers, insurance providers, home improvement companies, healthcare / fitness companies, timeshare / vacation rentals, etc. ​ If you are interested in becoming a corporate vendor, please email Margaret-Anne West mdwest@fiestapensacola.org ​ SEAFOOD EATS & OTHER TREATS All food vendor categories are NOW OPEN! ​ Please follow our social medias and check back here for updates about the 2025 Pensacola Seafood Festival v endor a pplications. GULF TO TABLE VENDORS APPLICATION The Gulf to Table vendor category consists of local restaurants and caterers, serving tapas sized portions of their signature dishes. ​ FOOD VENDORS & FOOD TRUCKS Please email Mike your vendor information pcolaevents@gmail.com : Including booth/truck name, owner/manager's name proposed menu, email address and phone number. ​ CART VENDORS Please email Mike your vendor information pcolaevents@gmail.com : Including booth/truck name, owner/manager's name proposed menu, email address and phone number. TASTE \\  SEE  \\  LISTEN  \\  TOUCH A GULF COAST EXPERIENCE TO... INTERESTED IN BECOMING A SPONSOR AT OUR EVENT? EMAIL MCLEIDNER@FIESTAPENSACOLA.ORG WITH ANY INQUIRIES STAY HOOKED UP QUESTIONS? Call Fiesta Pensacola, 850-433-6512 © 2017 by FIESTA PENSACOLA bottom of page
